price: Ayyuubiinis ‘yeroo inni Gooftaa isaatti lallabee “ani rakkoon na tuqeera; Ati irra rahmata godhaa warra rahmata godhaniiti” (jedhu yaadadhu)
arabic: ۞ وَأَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-ḍuru wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
